name: BusinessHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, headlines from Mach Eye”
”Alexa, open Mach Eye”
”Alexa, business briefings from Mach Eye”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mach eye
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MachEye is the only personal business companion built for every business user and for all their data. MachEye shatters the barriers that prevent organizations of all sizes from unleashing personalized BI for everyone. With MachEye, organizations are equipped with a single, integrated platform that delivers insights as interactive audio-visuals, combined with natural search and click-less intelligence. MachEye is built for the cloud with AI as an architecture; discovers secure and governed business insights without limits; and gives a “play button” for data. 

- NATURAL SEARCH: A “Google-like” natural search functionality with search suggestions, ambiguity correction, and search prompts on any device. The business users are empowered to interact with enterprise data in an easy & intuitive manner and receive instant results.

- CLICK-LESS INTELLIGENCE: By using AI and machine learning in real time, MachEye discovers hyper-personalized insights based on users’ interests and behaviors. These insights are refined over time and are eventually automatically generated. 

- INTERACTIVE AUDIO-VISUAL EXPERIENCE: Storytelling brings data literacy to every business user. Presenting insights as interactive audio-visuals, MachEye helps users explore and engage with data in an intuitive way. 

- LOW-PREP / NO-PREP DEPLOYMENTS: With a built-in data catalog, MachEye curates data, identifies entity relationships within data, and helps with customized calculations using computed attributes. Start instant analysis with usable and curated metadata for accurate insights.

- DATA QUALITY ANALYSIS: Source data is analyzed with sophisticated business algorithms to provide a data quality index, and the cataloging engine provides continuous updates for reliable, trusted insights. 

- CLOUD-NATIVE PLATFORM: Being a cloud-native SaaS offering, MachEye connects to all data sources in minutes. With no data duplication or additional infrastructure, MachEye helps maintain a single source of truth. Start accessing insights anywhere and anytime.
